class Scan[source]

Scan(title, dcm_series)

Represents a medical imaging single 3D volume.

Attributes: title: str represnting name of volume

dcm_series: series of dcm files containing volume
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Scan.write_nifti[source]

Scan.write_nifti(output_path)

Writes a Nfiti file of 3D volume to a specified output path.

Args: output_path (path or str): Desired output path of Nifti file

Returns: path: Path to which the Nifti file has been written

Scan.display_3D_volume[source]

Scan.display_3D_volume(fig=False)

Disolay a 2D representation of the 3D volume

Args:
fig (bool, optional): _description. toggle show in place
or fig object. Defaults to False._

Returns: fig: Figure
